mapper.sql: id, uid, shopId, address, goodsId, goodsName, count, total, piece, isTraded, creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate, status
mapper.update:
UPDATE cm_business_indent
uid = #{map.uid},
shopId = #{map.shopId},
address = #{map.address},
goodsId = #{map.goodsId},
goodsName = #{map.goodsName},
count = #{map.count},
total = #{map.total},
piece = #{map.piece},
isTraded = #{map.isTraded},
creator = #{map.creator},
createDate = #{map.createDate},
lastModifier = #{map.lastModifier},
lastModDate = #{map.lastModDate},
status = #{map.status},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM cm_business_indent
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{id} , '%')
AND uid like CONCAT('%', #{uid} , '%')
AND shopId like CONCAT('%', #{shopId} , '%')
AND address like CONCAT('%', #{address} , '%')
AND goodsId like CONCAT('%', #{goodsId} , '%')
AND goodsName like CONCAT('%', #{goodsName} , '%')
AND count like CONCAT('%', #{count} , '%')
AND total like CONCAT('%', #{total} , '%')
AND piece like CONCAT('%', #{piece} , '%')
AND isTraded like CONCAT('%', #{isTraded} , '%')
AND creator like CONCAT('%', #{creator} , '%')
AND createDate like CONCAT('%', #{createDate} , '%')
AND lastModifier like CONCAT('%', #{lastModifier} , '%')
AND lastModDate like CONCAT('%', #{lastModDate} , '%')
AND status like CONCAT('%', #{status} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
